meanings.definition: The front part of a house.
meanings.sent1: The housefronts of the neighborhood were all beautifully decorated with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I walked down the street, admiring the unique designs of the housefronts.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel climbed up the housefronts, looking for a cozy spot to nap.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the shadows cast by the housefronts grew longer and more mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The freshly painted housefronts gleamed in the morning light, brightening up the whole block.
